backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing three high‑confidence frontend tasks with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of all major frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying them globally.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry containing boot fallback UI, metadata, and styling for loading before React mounts.
frontend/public/health.html: Standalone health‑check page showing uptime status, build info, and basic diagnostic guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that sets up theming, Web3 provider, error boundary, dashboard rendering, and dispatches a one‑time app‑mounted event.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Balance display component handling BNB and token balances, valuations, manual refresh, live updates, and metadata cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Displays vault contract details including address, owner, network info, and copy/BscScan links using data from useVaultInfo.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Form for depositing BNB or tokens into the vault with balance display, validation, transaction handling, and history logging.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsBar.t: Shows build and environment info and provides copyable diagnostics and performance data for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches application errors and renders a fallback UI with error details, recovery options, and troubleshooting tips.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with branding, build info, attribution, and a referral link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header displaying app branding and a light/dark theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Token input field supporting dropdown token selection or manual address entry, using saved token catalogs and watched tokens.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Renders a scrollable transaction history list with status icons, BscScan links, and a clear-history action.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Handles wallet connection, network switching, initialization states, and mobile-specific instructions.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Provides BNB and token withdrawal forms, manages submission flow, errors, and logs transactions to history.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Augments the Window type with Ethereum provider fields for MetaMask compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous Internet Computer actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
Fetches BNB and token prices to compute USD and BNB valuations for balances with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating Web3 is used instead of IC backend queries.
Manages a persistent map of token addresses to labels using localStorage, providing CRUD helpers and fallback labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenMetadataCache: Caches token metadata (symbol, decimals, name) in localStorage with versioning and exposes get/set/clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Stores and updates transaction history in localStorage with automatic polling to update pending transaction statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches and caches BNB and token balances from the vault with metadata lookup, polling, and timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Fetches and exposes the vault owner address with loading and error state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal helpers that encode and send contract calls, tracking operation states.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Maintains a validated, normalized list of watched token addresses persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Provides a React context for wallet connection, chain switching, contract calls, and mobile/MetaMask detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a full light/dark mode color system using custom CSS variables.
frontend/src/lib/appBranding.ts: Holds app branding constants and helpers for names and identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Stores build version metadata and utilities to retrieve build identifiers from constants or meta tags.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Defines contract addresses, method signatures, and helpers for encoding and decoding EVM calls.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Implements low-level EVM utilities for address validation and encoding/decoding uint256, addresses, and unit conversions.
frontend/src/lib/evmAbiText.ts: Provides ABI text decoding utilities for ERC‑20 metadata such as name and symbol.
frontend/src/lib/performanceCheck.ts: Collects build and performance timing data and formats it for display or export.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches BNB and token prices from CoinGecko and provides price formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merging helper using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard UI handling wallet connection state, network checks, and vault balance views with tabs and forms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing issues, required fixes, and existing feature definitions for wallet connection and balance refresh.
